'''Task name:''' Logging in

'''Description:''' Test to what extent it is possible for different user groups to log in independently and securely.

'''Procedure:'''
* Boot the computer
* At the GDM login screen, log in 
** try user names and passwords that require shifted symbols, like <code>#</code> and <code>$</code>
* Turn on screen-reader by using the accessibility icon on the lower line of the screen. 
* Insure the password is not echoed.
** If logging in with the screen-reader active, it should remain active when using the desktop.
* Repeat with KDM if possible

* Turn on screen-reader by using the accessibility icon on the lower line of the screen. 
* Insure the password is not echoed.

'''Comments:'''
* Please include the release you are testing with in your comment. Include your launchpad ID at the end of your comments:
** Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
** Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID.
